## Navigation.enableInactivityMonitoring property

Boolean attribute which controls whether to enable inactivity monitoring Control via `enable-inactivity-monitoring`

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableInactivityMonitoring: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Default is true
